entry.title: RAINFALL WARNING , Brier Island
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 3. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries beginning near midnight. Fog patches overnight. Wind becoming southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4 with temperature rising to plus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 40 to 50 mm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 70 becoming south 60 gusting to 90 in the morning then southwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Wednesday 25 January 2023
